menu.title: Bacon-Burger
menu.description: Juicy beef patty with crispy bacon, melted cheddar, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and house sauce on a toasted brioche bun.

menu.title: Big-King
menu.description: Double beef patties with melted American cheese, fresh lettuce, pickles, onions, and signature King sauce.

menu.title: Cheese Burger
menu.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomatoes, and pickles on a toasted bun.

menu.title: Double Beef
menu.description: Two juicy beef patties with melted cheese, crisp lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and special sauce on a toasted bun.

menu.title: Double Cheese
menu.description: Two beef patties with melted American cheese, pickles, onions, and ketchup on a toasted bun.

menu.title: Original
menu.description: Juicy beef patty with crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, pickles, and classic sauce on a toasted bun. Simple and delicious!.

menu.title: Smokey
menu.description: Grilled beef patty with smoked bacon, melted cheddar, crispy onions, and smoky BBQ sauce on a toasted bun. Rich and flavorful!

menu.title: Sweet Onion
menu.description: Juicy beef patty topped with caramelized sweet onions, melted Swiss cheese, fresh lettuce, and creamy mayo on a toasted bun.

menu.title: Texas
menu.description: Bold beef patty with melted cheddar, BBQ sauce, jalape√±os on a toasted bun. Big flavor, Texas style!

menu.title: Frida
menu.description: Refreshing fermented tea with a tangy, effervescent twist. A naturally probiotic boost for your day!

menu.title: Oreo Shake
menu.description: Creamy vanilla milkshake blended with chunks of Oreo cookies, topped with whipped cream. A classic treat with a twist!

menu.title: Olipop
menu.description: A delicious, sparkling prebiotic soda with a blend of gut-friendly fibers and botanical extracts.

menu.title: Tropical Bliss
menu.description: A tropical blend of zesty lime and creamy coconut, served chilled for a refreshing and exotic twist.

menu.title: Potato Fries
menu.description: Crispy and golden fries, perfectly seasoned and served hot. The ideal side for any meal!

menu.title: Sweet Potato Fries
menu.description: Crispy, golden sweet potato fries with a hint of natural sweetness, lightly seasoned.
